amendment.description: An amendment numbered 139 printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the removal of companies from the Section 1260H List of Chinese Civil-Military Fusion companies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
